name: unslakable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unslakable feeling of being thirsty, or of wanting something, cannot be satisfied: His thirst was unslakable and he was sleeping up to 16 hours a day. What is remarkable about her is not the sheer number of records she holds, but her unslakeable appetite for more.
More examplesFewer examplesHer unslakeable curiosity was part of her appeal.His unslakable thirst for artistic challenge led him to expand the boundaries of performance as no previous male dancer had.We will miss his unslakeable ambition.
